mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM pickup_history p left join shipment s on p.shipment_id = s.id left join shipment_detail sd on p.shipment_detail_id = sd.id WHERE p.area is null and p.block is null and p.bay is null and p.line is null and p.tier is null

SELECT p.* FROM pickup_history p left join shipment s on p.shipment_id = s.id left join shipment_detail sd on p.shipment_detail_id = sd.id WHERE p.area is not null or (p.block is not null and p.bay is not null and p.line is not null and p.tier is not null)
ORDER BY planning_date desc
where id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
select seq_pickup_history.nextval as id from DUAL
insert into pickup_history
id, logistic_group_id, shipment_id, shipment_detail_id, driver_id, pickup_assign_id, container_no, truck_no, chassis_no, area, bay, block, line, tier, status, receipt_date, gatein_date, gateout_date, cancel_receipt_date, planning_date, process_order_id, gate_pass, job_order_no, job_order_flg, loadable_wgt, sztp, distance, update_location_time, remark, create_by, create_time
#{id}, #{logisticGroupId}, #{shipmentId}, #{shipmentDetailId}, #{driverId}, #{pickupAssignId}, #{containerNo}, #{truckNo}, #{chassisNo}, #{area}, #{bay}, #{block}, #{line}, #{tier}, #{status}, #{receiptDate}, #{gateinDate}, #{gateoutDate}, #{cancelDeceiptDate}, #{planningDate}, #{processOrderId}, #{gatePass}, #{jobOrderNo}, #{jobOrderFlg}, #{loadableWgt}, #{sztp}, #{distance}, #{update_location_time}, #{remark}, #{createBy}, sysdate
mapper.delete:
delete from pickup_history where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select * from shipment_detail where id = #{id}
select * from shipment where id = #{id}
select * from logistic_group where id = #{id}
select * from driver_account where id = #{id}
select * from driver_account where id = #{id}

SELECT p.id, p.logistic_group_id, p.shipment_id, p.shipment_detail_id, p.status, p.gatein_date, p.container_no, p.truck_no, p.chassis_no, s.service_type, sh.bl_no, sh.booking_no, sh.sztp, sh.vsl_nm, sh.voy_no, sh.create_time FROM pickup_history p left join shipment s on p.shipment_id = s.id left join shipment_detail sh on p.shipment_detail_id = sh.id
and p.logistic_group_id = #{logisticGroupId} and p.status = #{status} and s.service_type = #{serviceType} and (p.gatein_date >= #{fromDate}) and (p.gatein_date <= #{toDate}) and ( upper(p.container_no) like concat(concat('%', #{containerNo}), '%') or upper(p.truck_no) like concat(concat('%', #{truckNo}), '%') or upper(p.chassis_no) like concat(concat('%', #{chassisNo}), '%') or upper(sh.bl_no) like concat (concat('%', #{blNo}), '%') or upper(sh.booking_no) like concat(concat('%', #{bookingNo}), '%') or upper(sh.sztp) like concat(concat('%', #{sztp}), '%') or upper(sh.vsl_nm) like concat(concat('%', #{vslNm}), '%') or upper(sh.voy_no) like concat(concat('%', #{voyNo}), '%'))
group by p.id, p.logistic_group_id, p.shipment_id, p.shipment_detail_id, p.status, p.gatein_date, p.container_no, p.truck_no, p.chassis_no, s.service_type, sh.bl_no, sh.booking_no, sh.sztp, sh.vsl_nm, sh.voy_no, sh.create_time order by sh.create_time desc

SELECT p.id, p.logistic_group_id, p.shipment_id, p.shipment_detail_id, p.driver_id, p.container_no, p.truck_no, p.chassis_no, p.gatein_date, p.create_time, s.service_type, s.bl_no, s.booking_no, d.full_name, d.mobile_number FROM pickup_history p left join shipment s on p.shipment_id = s.id left join driver_account d on p.driver_id = d.id left join logistic_group l on l.id = p.logistic_group_id
and p.logistic_group_id = #{logisticGroupId} and p.status = #{status} and s.service_type = #{serviceType} and p.gatein_date >= #{fromDate} and p.gatein_date <= #{toDate} and (upper(p.container_no) like concat(concat('%', #{containerNo}), '%') or upper(p.truck_no) like concat(concat('%', #{truckNo}), '%') or upper(p.chassis_no) like concat(concat('%', #{chassisNo}), '%') or upper(d.full_name) like concat(concat('%', #{driverName}), '%') or upper(d.mobile_number) like concat(concat('%', #{driverPhoneNumber}), '%') or upper(l.group_name) like concat(concat('%', #{logisticGroupName}), '%') or upper(s.bl_no) like concat (concat('%', #{blNo}), '%') or upper(s.booking_no) like concat(concat('%', #{bookingNo}), '%'))
group by p.id, p.logistic_group_id, p.shipment_id, p.shipment_detail_id, p.driver_id, p.container_no, p.truck_no, p.chassis_no, p.gatein_date, p.create_time, s.service_type, s.bl_no, s.booking_no, d.full_name, d.mobile_number order by p.create_time desc

SELECT * FROM pickup_history p left join pickup_assign a on p.pickup_assign_id = a.id left join shipment_detail sh on p.shipment_detail_id = sh.id
and p.shipment_id = #{shipmentId}
select id as pickupHistoryId, container_no as containerNo, gatein_date as gateInDate from pickup_history where driver_id = #{userId} and status = 2 order by gatein_date desc

select p.id as pickupId, p.container_no as containerNo, p.shipment_id as batchCode, p.truck_no as truckNo, p.sztp as sztp, p.status as status, p.chassis_no as chassisNo, p.block, p.bay, p.line, p.tier, p.area, s.service_type as serviceType from pickup_history p left join shipment s on p.shipment_id = s.id left join shipment_detail sh on p.shipment_detail_id = sh.id where p.driver_id = #{driverId} and p.status != 2 order by s.service_type desc

select p.id as pickupHistoryId, p.container_no as containerNo, P.gate_pass as gatePass, p.gatein_date as gateInDate, p.shipment_id as batchId, p.truck_no as truckNo, p.status as status, p.chassis_no as chassisNo, p.sztp as sztp, sh.consignee as consignee, concat(concat(concat(p.block, concat('-', p.bay)), concat('-', p.line)), concat('-', p.tier)) as yardPosition, sh.wgt as wgt, sh.cargo_type as cargoType, sh.delivery_address as address, sh.delivery_mobile as mobileNumber, sh.delivery_remark as remark from pickup_history p left join shipment s on p.shipment_id = s.id left join shipment_detail sh on p.shipment_detail_id = sh.id where p.id = #{pickupId} and p.driver_id = #{driverId} group by p.id, p.container_no, p.gate_pass, p.gatein_date, p.shipment_id, p.truck_no, p.status, p.chassis_no, p.sztp, sh.consignee, p.block, p.bay, p.line, p.tier, sh.wgt, sh.cargo_type, sh.delivery_address, sh.delivery_mobile, sh.delivery_remark
